title: Is it weird to main a champion and want them nerfed?
body:
I mean I main Syndra and I want her E nerfed because I find it to be stupidly strong considering several times I've seen a 0/5 Syndra still 100-0 me because of that stupid stun and also, let's take into consideration of how big the hitbox is, how it's an AOE stun, the missile speed (2500), and how it has too much in general.

Aside from Syndra, is this weird to not be wanting to protect freelo? Or is this normal?
